sentence.Network_en: It encourages the would - be American poet to rely too exclusively on a rapt and bardic intuition.
sentence.Network_cn: 它鼓励未来的美国诗人完全依靠发狂似的诗人的直觉.

sentence.Network_en: They began to write for record, to help and fix their bardic tradition.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们开始为记事而书写, 助长并固定了他们的诗歌传统.
